title: "Disgusting": White House Describes Sexist Attacks On Kamala Harris
content: The White House on Thursday described as "disgusting" the increasing sexist and racist attacks on Vice President Kamala Harris which has intensified after she became the presumptive presidential nominee of the Democratic party.
summary: The White House on Thursday described as "disgusting" the increasing sexist and racist attacks on Vice President Kamala Harris which has intensified after she became the presumptive presidential nominee of the Democratic party.

title: Trump Leads Kamala Harris 48%-46% Among Registered Voters: Survey
content: Republican Donald Trump leads Democratic U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris by 48% to 46% in a New York Times/Siena College poll of registered voters conducted July 22 to 24 and published on Thursday.
summary: Republican Donald Trump leads Democratic U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris by 48% to 46% in a New York Times/Siena College poll of registered voters conducted July 22 to 24 and published on Thursday.

title: Humanity Suffering From "Extreme Heat Epidemic": UN Chief
content: Humanity is suffering from an "extreme heat epidemic," UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres warned Thursday, calling for action to limit the impacts of heat waves intensified by climate change.
summary: Humanity is suffering from an "extreme heat epidemic," UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres warned Thursday, calling for action to limit the impacts of heat waves intensified by climate change.

title: Israeli PM Netanyahu Says Will Work With Joe Biden "In The Months Ahead"
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Thursday he would work with Joe Biden for his remaining time in office, after the US president's stunning decision to drop his reelection bid.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Thursday he would work with Joe Biden for his remaining time in office, after the US president's stunning decision to drop his reelection bid.

title: Israel Warns France Of Iranian Threats Against Israelis At Olympics Games
content: Israel warned France on Thursday of potential threats from Iran-backed groups against Israeli athletes and tourists in Paris during the Olympic Games.
summary: Israel warned France on Thursday of potential threats from Iran-backed groups against Israeli athletes and tourists in Paris during the Olympic Games.

title: North Korean Hackers Trying To Steal Military Secrets, Say US, Allies
content: North Korean hackers have conducted a global cyber espionage campaign to try to steal classified military secrets to support Pyongyang's banned nuclear weapons programme, the United States, Britain and South Korea said in a joint advisory on Thursday
summary: North Korean hackers have conducted a global cyber espionage campaign to try to steal classified military secrets to support Pyongyang's banned nuclear weapons programme, the United States, Britain and South Korea said in a joint advisory on Thursday

title: South Africa Scripts History, Gets First Woman Chief Justice
content: South African judge Mandisa Maya was appointed chief justice by President Cyril Ramaphosa on Thursday, becoming the first female to secure the role.
summary: South African judge Mandisa Maya was appointed chief justice by President Cyril Ramaphosa on Thursday, becoming the first female to secure the role.

title: "Unpatriotic": Kamala Harris Slams US Flag Burning At Anti-Netanyahu Protest
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris on Thursday condemned the "despicable" and "unpatriotic" burning of an American flag by protesters who rallied in Washington during Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's address to Congress.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris on Thursday condemned the "despicable" and "unpatriotic" burning of an American flag by protesters who rallied in Washington during Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's address to Congress.

title: 21 Killed In Morocco Amid Scorching Heatwave In Last 24 Hours
content: A heatwave in Morocco has killed at least 21 people in a 24-hour period in the central city of Beni Mellal, the health ministry announced on Thursday.
summary: A heatwave in Morocco has killed at least 21 people in a 24-hour period in the central city of Beni Mellal, the health ministry announced on Thursday.

title: Trump Urges Quick End To War Ahead Of Meeting Israel PM Benjamin Netanyahu
content: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump, one day before meeting Israel's Benjamin Netanyahu, called for a quick end to its war with Hamas and a return of the hostages, adding that Israel has to better manage its "public relations".
summary: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump, one day before meeting Israel's Benjamin Netanyahu, called for a quick end to its war with Hamas and a return of the hostages, adding that Israel has to better manage its "public relations".

title: Deadly Rat Disease Spreads to Humans, Kills 4 In US
content: Hantavirus: According to the US Centres for Disease Control and Prevention, this virus is a family of viruses spread mainly by rodents and can cause varied disease syndromes.
summary: Hantavirus: According to the US Centres for Disease Control and Prevention, this virus is a family of viruses spread mainly by rodents and can cause varied disease syndromes.

title: Denmark's Queen Mary Hit By Electric Scooter During Royal Visit In Greenland
content: The Danish royal communications office later announced that Queen Mary had not been injured.
summary: The Danish royal communications office later announced that Queen Mary had not been injured.

title: HIV Patients Cured Through Risky Transplant Are Now "Living Proof" Of Hope
content: Three people effectively cured of HIV have spoken about how a risky transplant procedure saved their lives, with one saying they are "living proof" of hope in the fight against the virus.
summary: Three people effectively cured of HIV have spoken about how a risky transplant procedure saved their lives, with one saying they are "living proof" of hope in the fight against the virus.

title: Black Box Of Aircraft Crashed In Nepal Found, Handed Over To Probe Team
content: Nepalese authorities on Thursday recovered the black box of the aircraft that crashed here a day before and handed it over to a probe team formed to inquire into the tragic accident that killed 18 persons, including a child.
summary: Nepalese authorities on Thursday recovered the black box of the aircraft that crashed here a day before and handed it over to a probe team formed to inquire into the tragic accident that killed 18 persons, including a child.

title: Paris Olympics: Meet Yahya Al Ghotany, The 19-Year-Old Syrian Flag Bearer
content: Yahya Al Ghotany got a black belt 2nd dan level in taekwondo just five years after starting the sport, a feat that typically takes seven years to accomplish.Â
summary: Yahya Al Ghotany got a black belt 2nd dan level in taekwondo just five years after starting the sport, a feat that typically takes seven years to accomplish.

title: Explained: Why Nepal Suffers From High Number Of Air Crashes?
content: Eighteen people were killed in Nepal when a small passenger plane crashed while taking off from the main airport in the capital Kathmandu, drawing attention once again to the Himalayan nation's poor record on air safety.
summary: Eighteen people were killed in Nepal when a small passenger plane crashed while taking off from the main airport in the capital Kathmandu, drawing attention once again to the Himalayan nation's poor record on air safety.

title: 2 Helicopters Collide Shortly After Take-Off In Australia
content: Two helicopters were reported to have collided in midair on Thursday in Western Australia, with injuries unknown at the current stage.
summary: Two helicopters were reported to have collided in midair on Thursday in Western Australia, with injuries unknown at the current stage.

title: Meta Removes 63,000 Accounts Involved In "Sextortion" Scams From Nigeria
content: They targeted primarily adult men in the US and used fake accounts to mask their identities Meta said in a statement
summary: They targeted primarily adult men in the US and used fake accounts to mask their identities Meta said in a statement

title: Russian And Chinese Bombers Patrol Near Alaska In Joint Military Exercise
content: Russian and Chinese bomber jets carried out a joint patrol over far eastern Russia and the Bering Sea near Alaska, Russia's defence ministry said Thursday.
summary: Russian and Chinese bomber jets carried out a joint patrol over far eastern Russia and the Bering Sea near Alaska, Russia's defence ministry said Thursday.

title: Yusra Mardini, Olympian Who Crossed A Sea At 17 To Escape War-Torn Syria
content: Olympics honour refugee athletes who have overcome incredible obstacles to pursue their dreams. One such athlete is Yusra Mardini, a Syrian refugee who fled her war-torn country as a teenager and went on to compete in the 2016 and 2020 Games.
summary: Olympics honour refugee athletes who have overcome incredible obstacles to pursue their dreams. One such athlete is Yusra Mardini, a Syrian refugee who fled her war-torn country as a teenager and went on to compete in the 2016 and 2020 Games.
